column5: A friend of mine emailed me and asked about what lake maps I like. Thought I might pass it on to all. Check out Trak Maps. I like the chart section because it has good detail. Any other suggestions? Mike Kansas

Is that detail on our Canadian lakes or just some of the us ones.I have using a canada chip for 6 years and find it alright.could be better and maybe there's newer ones.don't even really need anymore on the lakes I fish on.
Thanks Mike I just ordered a set for Lac Seul NW and SW.The other end of the lake isn't ready for me yet.Bill
They have maps on a lot ofCanadian lakes and I'm not sure but I bet a lot of US lakes too.
You won't be sorry Bill. Heck I bet you even catch a few more fish because of them. Mike Kansas

MikeI got the maps yesterday.In the first 15 minutes I marked 12 places to check on my next trip.That was only on one map.Now I have to go over the second one.I'm sure there will be a phone call involved in this somewhere.Bill
